event Added(address indexed deployer, address indexed deployment, uint256 indexed chainId, string metadataUri)
event Deleted(address indexed deployer, address indexed deployment, uint256 indexed chainId)
function add(address _deployer, address _deployment, uint256 _chainId, string metadataUri)
function getAll(address _deployer) view returns ((address deploymentAddress, uint256 chainId, string metadataURI)[] allDeployments)
function getMetadataUri(uint256 _chainId, address _deployment) view returns (string metadataUri)
